infotexts.entitydescription.timed40mmgrenade: A 40mm grenade with a 2 second timer until detonation.
infotexts.entitydescription.fulguriumpulselaseramm: A collection of high-performance fulgurium-laced chemicals and lenses for use in a Pulse Laser.
infotexts.entitydescription.physicoriumcanistershe: A canister of small pellets that shred flesh and devastate any soft targets.
